name: CharityChooser
0:
”Alexa, start Charity Chooser”
”Get a quick recommendation”
”Take the quiz”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: charity chooser
des:
With all the problems happening around the world, sometimes we want to help, but aren't sure where to start! Solve that problem by using Charity Chooser.

Using Charity Navigator's database of US charities, including their four-star rating system, Charity Chooser will take you through a short quiz to determine what sort of charity suits you the best. 

Once you've answered the questions, Alexa will give you the name of a charity that matches your responses. Then you can have the details sent to your Alexa app, or just visit the website.

If you are in a hurry, the app can just suggest a charity that matches up with some of the currently trending issues of the day.

Thanks to Charity Navigator for the use of their data in creating this skill!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
